name: Randotrotter: Random Journeys
description:
Go on a journey like never before with Randotrotter! Discover your city or neighborhood by generating a truly random set of coordinates.

This app is completely free and extremely stable, allowing you to generate an adventure at any time of the day.

Along with this, this app will give you truly unique experiences, generating you places you will likely have never visited! Join the community of Randotrotters today!
